00074 /* Link Types */
00075 typedef enum CAEN_Comm_ConnectionType {
00076  CAENComm_USB                           = 0,
00077  CAENComm_PCI_OpticalLink       = 1,
00078  CAENComm_PCIE_OpticalLink      = 2,
00079  CAENComm_PCIE                          = 3,
00080 } CAENComm_ConnectionType;
00081 
00082 typedef enum CAENComm_ErrorCode {
00083 /* Error Types */
00084  CAENComm_Success                     =  0,     /* Operation completed successfully                                     */
00085  CAENComm_VMEBusError         = -1,     /* VME bus error during the cycle                                       */
00086  CAENComm_CommError           = -2,     /* Communication error                                                  */
00087  CAENComm_GenericError        = -3,     /* Unspecified error                                                    */
00088  CAENComm_InvalidParam        = -4,     /* Invalid parameter                                                    */
00089  CAENComm_InvalidLinkType     = -5,     /* Invalid Link Type                                                    */
00090  CAENComm_InvalidHandler      = -6,     /* Invalid device handler                                               */
00091  CAENComm_CommTimeout             = -7,     /* Communication Timeout                                                                    */
00092  CAENComm_DeviceNotFound      = -8,     /* Unable to Open the requested Device                                  */
00093  CAENComm_MaxDevicesError     = -9,     /* Maximum number of devices exceeded                       */
00094  CAENComm_DeviceAlreadyOpen   = -10,    /* The device is already opened                                                 */
00095  CAENComm_NotSupported            = -11,    /* Not supported function                                                           */
00096  CAENComm_UnusedBridge        = -12,    /* There aren't board controlled by that CAEN Bridge            */
00097  CAENComm_Terminated              = -13,    /* Communication terminated by the Device                           */
00098 } CAENComm_ErrorCode;
00099 
00100 typedef enum CAENCOMM_INFO {
00101                 CAENComm_PCI_Board_SN           = 0,            /* s/n of the PCI/PCIe board    */
00102                 CAENComm_PCI_Board_FwRel        = 1,            /* Firmware Release fo the PCI/PCIe board       */
00103                 CAENComm_VME_Bridge_SN          = 2,            /* s/n of the VME bridge */
00104                 CAENComm_VME_Bridge_FwRel1      = 3,            /* Firmware Release for the VME bridge */
00105                 CAENComm_VME_Bridge_FwRel2      = 4,            /* Firmware Release for the optical chipset inside the VME bridge (V2718 only)*/
00106 } CAENCOMM_INFO;

00109 typedef enum IRQLevels {
00110         IRQ1 = 0x01,        /* Interrupt level 1                            */
00111         IRQ2 = 0x02,        /* Interrupt level 2                            */
00112         IRQ3 = 0x04,        /* Interrupt level 3                            */
00113         IRQ4 = 0x08,        /* Interrupt level 4                            */
00114         IRQ5 = 0x10,        /* Interrupt level 5                            */
00115         IRQ6 = 0x20,        /* Interrupt level 6                            */
00116         IRQ7 = 0x40         /* Interrupt level 7                            */
00117 } IRQLevels;
